DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Fortigate UTM appliances that use firmware version 2.5.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) .+ log_id=(\d+) (.+) proto=(\d+) service=([/\w-]+) status=(\w+) src=([.\d]+) (srcname=[-\w.]+) dst=([.\d]+) (dstname=[-\w.]+) src_int=([-/\w.]+) dst_int=([-/\w.]+) (.+) src_port=(\d+) dst_port=(\d+) (.+)
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ .+ log_id=0001000002 .+ proto=(?:6|17) service=dns status=\w+ src=[.\d]+ srcname=[-\w.]+ dst=[.\d]+ dstname=[-\w.]+ src_int=[-/\w.]+ dst_int=[-/\w.]+ .+ src_port=\d+ dst_port=\d+ .+

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) .+ log_id=(\d+) (.+) proto=(\d+) service=([/\w-]+) status=(\w+) src=([.\d]+) (srcname=[-\w.]+) dst=([.\d]+) (dstname=[-\w.]+) src_int=([-/\w.]+) dst_int=([-/\w.]+) (.+) src_port=(\d+) dst_port=(\d+) (.+)

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ .+ log_id=0001000002 .+ proto=1 service=[/\w-]+ status=\w+ src=[.\d]+ srcname=[-\w.]+ dst=[.\d]+ dstname=[-\w.]+ src_int=[-/\w.]+ dst_int=[-/\w.]+ .+ src_port=\d+ dst_port=\d+ .+

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ .+ log_id=0001000002 .+ proto=\d+ service=[/\w-]+ status=\w+ src=[.\d]+ srcname=[-\w.]+ dst=[.\d]+ dstname=[-/\w.]+ src_int=[-/\w.]+ dst_int=[-\w.]+ .+ src_port=\d+ dst_port=\d+ .+
^\d+ [-\w.]+ .+ log_id=0101\d+ .+ loc_ip=[.\d]+ loc_port=\d+ rem_ip=[.\d]+ rem_port=\d+ out_if=[-/\w.]+ vpn_tunnel=[-/\w.]+ .* ?msg="[^"]+"

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) (.+) log_id=(\d+) (.+) src=([\d.]+) sport=\d+ src_port=(\d+) src_int="([^"]+)" dst=([\d.]+) dport=\d+ dst_port=(\d+) dst_int="([^"]+)" service="([^"]+)" hostname="([-*/\w:.]+)" carrier_ep="[^"]+" profiletype="[^"]+" profilegroup="[^"]+" profile="([^"]+)" status="(\w+)" req_type="[^"]+" url="(.+)" sent=\d+ rcvd=\d+ msg="([^"]+)"\s*(?: method=\w+ class=\d+ class_desc="[^"]+" cat=(\d+) cat_desc="([^"]+)")?.*

FastFormatter.condition: .*devname=(\S+).* type=[-\w]+ subtype=[-\w]+ pri=(\w+).* vd=(\S+) policyid=(\w+).* serial=\d+ user="([^"]+)" group="([^"]+)".*
FastFormatter.format: Device: $21, Priority: $22, Virtual Domain: $23, User: "$25", Group: "$26", Profile: "$14", Policy ID: $24, Msg: "$17"

FastFormatter.condition: type=[-\w]+ subtype=[-\w]+ pri=(\w+).* vd=(\S+) policyid=(\w+).* serial=\d+ user="([^"]+)" group="([^"]+)".*
FastFormatter.format: Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $22, User: "$24", Group: "$25", Profile: "$14", Policy ID: $23, Msg: "$17"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$22"
Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$21"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$22", Group: "$23"
Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$21", Group: "$22"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15

Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$21"

Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$21", Group: "$22"

Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$21", Group: "$22"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15

FastFormatter.condition: .*devname=(\S+).* type=[-\w]+ subtype=[-\w]+ pri=(\w+).* vd=(\S+) reason=(.+) msg="(.+)"
FastFormatter.format: Device: $16, Priority: $17, Virtual Domain: $18, AP: "$7", SN: "$6", VAP: "$8", Security: $12, Msg: "$20", Reason: "$19"
Priority: $16, Virtual Domain: $17, AP: "$7", SN: "$6", VAP: "$8", Security: $12, Msg: "$19", Reason: "$18"
Device: $16, Priority: $17, Virtual Domain: $18, AP: "$7", SN: "$6", VAP: "$8", Security: $12
Priority: $16, Virtual Domain: $17, AP: "$7", SN: "$6", VAP: "$8", Security: $12
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$22"
Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$21"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$22", Group: "$23"
Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$21", Group: "$22"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$22"
Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$21"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$22", Group: "$23"
Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$21", Group: "$22"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$22"
Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, Msg: "$21"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$22", Group: "$23"
Priority: $20, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15, User: "$21", Group: "$22"
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $6, Policy ID: $15

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) (.+) log_id=(\d+) (.+) msg="([^"]+)" action=(\S+) rem_ip=([\d.]+|N/A) loc_ip=([\d.]+|N/A) rem_port=(\d+) loc_port=(\S+) out_intf="(\S+)" cookies="[^"]+" user="([^"]+)" group="([^"]+)" xauth_user="([^"]+)" xauth_group="([^"]+)" vpn_tunnel="([^"]+)" *(.*)

FastFormatter.format: Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $22, VPN Tunnel: "$17", Xauth_User: "$15", Xauth_Group: "$16", Action: $7, Status: $23

FastFormatter.condition: 0101037129: .*devname=(\S+).* type=\w+ subtype=\w+ pri=(\w+).* vd=(\S+) status=(\w+) init=(\w+) mode=(\w+) dir=(\w+) stage=(\d+) role=\w+ result=\w+.*
FastFormatter.format: Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $22, VPN Tunnel: "$17", Xauth_User: "$15", Xauth_Group: "$16", Action: $7, Initialization: $24, Mode: $25, Stage: $27, Direction: $26, Status: $23
Device: $20, Priority: $21, Virtual Domain: $22, VPN Tunnel: "$17", Xauth_User: "$15", Xauth_Group: "$16"

FastPattern.pattern: log_id=0104032011 .+ action=roll-log reason=[-\w]+ log=[-\w.]* msg="Disk log has rolled\."
